history: Part of the Adani Group, it focuses on incubating new businesses in sectors like airports, roads, and data centers.
insights: Consolidated revenue fell by ₹31,118.52 crore from FY 2022-23 (₹127,539.50 crore) to FY 2023-24 (₹96,420.98 crore), indicating a significant market challenge.
Consolidated profit before tax increased by ₹2,033.04 crore from FY 2022-23 (₹3,607.24 crore) to FY 2023-24 (₹5,640.28 crore), despite the revenue drop, suggesting improved cost management.
Exceptional items resulted in a ₹715.37 crore loss in consolidated figures for FY 2023-24, significantly impacting overall profit.

Standalone revenue plummeted by ₹25,874.42 crore from FY 2022-23 (₹57,886.45 crore) to FY 2023-24 (₹32,012.03 crore), but profit before tax rose by ₹1,521.96 crore from FY 2022-23 (₹2,273.43 crore) to FY 2023-24 (₹3,795.39 crore).
Other Comprehensive Income in consolidated statements fluctuated from ₹1,368.65 crore in FY 2022-23 to ₹338.79 crore in FY 2023-24, demonstrating substantial year-over-year volatility.

company: Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone Ltd
history: India's largest private port operator and logistics company, part of the Adani Group.
insights: Consolidated revenue increased by ₹6,059.54 crore from FY 2022-23 (₹20,851.91 crore) to FY 2023-24 (₹26,710.56 crore), indicating strong sales growth.
Consolidated profit before tax surged by ₹3,916.90 crore from FY 2022-23 (₹6,712.49 crore) to FY 2023-24 (₹10,629.12 crore), showcasing improved profitability.
Exceptional items resulted in a significant loss of ₹373.70 crore in FY 2023-24 consolidated figures, contrasting with a smaller loss in the previous year.
Standalone operations showed a substantial profit increase of ₹2,001.05 crore from FY 2022-23 (₹529.93 crore) to FY 2023-24 (₹2,531.92 crore), despite a moderate revenue rise.
Other Comprehensive Income in consolidated statements improved significantly from a loss of ₹557.33 crore in FY 2022-23 to a smaller loss of ₹31.45 crore in FY 2023-24.

history: Established in 1983, it's one of Asia's largest integrated healthcare providers.
insights: Standalone Income from Operations increased by ₹7,490 million from FY 2022-23 (₹65,248 million) to FY 2023-24 (₹72,738 million), indicating revenue growth.
Consolidated Income from Operations increased by ₹24,467 million from FY 2022-23 (₹166,125 million) to FY 2023-24 (₹190,592 million), demonstrating significant revenue expansion.
Standalone Profit Before Tax rose by ₹1,011 million from FY 2022-23 (₹12,275 million) to FY 2023-24 (₹13,286 million), showing improved profitability.
Consolidated Profit Before Tax increased by ₹2,601 million from FY 2022-23 (₹11,437 million) to FY 2023-24 (₹13,606 million), highlighting enhanced profitability on a larger scale.

Earnings Per Share (EPS) decreased for Standalone from ₹75.45 in FY 2022-23 to ₹70.28 in FY 2023-24, while it increased for Consolidated from ₹56.97 to ₹62.50, indicating mixed performance in shareholder value.

history: Founded in 1942, it's India's largest paint company and a leading global decorative paint manufacturer.
insights: Standalone revenue increased by ₹772.64 crore (2.6%) from FY 2022-23 (₹30,078.40 crore) to FY 2023-24 (₹30,850.12 crore), showing modest growth.
Consolidated EBITDA surged by ₹1,626.62 crore (24.5%) from FY 2022-23 (₹6,646.32 crore) to FY 2023-24 (₹8,272.94 crore), indicating significant operational improvement.
Standalone profit before tax rose by ₹1,515.49 crore (27.6%) from FY 2022-23 (₹5,489.60 crore) to FY 2023-24 (₹7,005.04 crore), demonstrating strong profitability growth.
Consolidated profit after tax increased by ₹1,602.34 crore (32.5%) from FY 2022-23 (₹4,193.33 crore) to FY 2023-24 (₹5,557.69 crore), reflecting substantial net income improvement.
Consolidated Total Comprehensive Income grew by ₹1,381.99 crore (32.8%) from FY 2022-23 (₹4,208.37 crore) to FY 2023-24 (₹5,589.65 crore), indicating strong overall financial performance.

history: Established in 1993, it's a major Indian private sector bank offering a wide range of financial services.
insights: Total deposits grew by ₹121,696 crore (13%) from FY 2022-23 to FY 2023-24, indicating strong customer confidence.
Net profit surged by ₹15,281 crore (160%) from FY 2022-23 to FY 2023-24, demonstrating remarkable profitability improvement.
Net non-performing assets decreased to 0.31% in FY 2023-24, highlighting enhanced asset quality and reduced credit risk.
Net profit per employee increased by ₹6.43 lakhs from FY 2022-23 to FY 2023-24, signaling significant productivity gains.
Operating profit rose by ₹4,074 crore (16%) from FY 2022-23 to FY 2023-24, showcasing improved core operational performance.

history: Part of the Bajaj Group, it's a diversified financial services company involved in lending, insurance, and wealth management.
insights: Net Interest Income (NII) increased by ₹6,083 crore (29%) for Standalone and ₹6,993 crore (29%) for Consolidated from FY 2023 to FY 2024, indicating substantial growth in core lending profitability.
Pre-impairment operating profit rose by ₹4,677 crore (28%) for Standalone and ₹5,217 crore (28%) for Consolidated from FY 2023 to FY 2024, reflecting improved operational efficiency.
Profit Before Tax (PBT) increased by ₹3,171 crore (23%) for Standalone and ₹3,998 crore (24%) for Consolidated from FY 2023 to FY 2024, demonstrating strong overall profitability growth.
Profit After Tax (PAT) grew by ₹2,354 crore (23%) for Standalone and ₹2,943 crore (26%) for Consolidated from FY 2023 to FY 2024, showcasing significant net income improvement.
Earnings Per Share (EPS) basic increased by ₹36.79 for Standalone and ₹36.36 for Consolidated from FY 2023 to FY 2024, indicating enhanced shareholder value.

history: Established in 1954, it's a state-owned aerospace and defense electronics company.
insights: Turnover increased by ₹2,548,656 Lakhs from FY 2022-23 (₹17,333,337 Lakhs) to FY 2023-24 (₹19,811,993 Lakhs), indicating significant revenue growth.

Earnings Per Share (EPS) increased by ₹1.39 from FY 2022-23 (₹4.11) to FY 2023-24 (₹5.50), indicating enhanced shareholder value.
Book Value Per Share increased by ₹3.42 from FY 2022-23 (₹18.58) to FY 2023-24 (₹22.00), showing growth in the company's net assets per share.

history: Founded in 1995, it's a leading global telecommunications company with operations in Asia and Africa.
insights: Consolidated Gross Revenue increased by ₹108,376 Mn from FY 2022-23 (₹1,391,448 Mn) to FY 2023-24 (₹1,499,824 Mn), indicating significant revenue growth.
Consolidated EBITDA before exceptional items rose by ₹67,128 Mn from FY 2022-23 (₹717,330 Mn) to FY 2023-24 (₹790,458 Mn), showcasing improved operational profitability.
Consolidated Profit Before Tax decreased by ₹38,817 Mn from FY 2022-23 (₹165,607 Mn) to FY 2023-24 (₹126,790 Mn), indicating a decline in pre-tax profits.
Standalone Profit Before Tax increased by ₹83,853 Mn from FY 2022-23 (₹(12,693) Mn) to FY 2023-24 (₹71,161 Mn), showing a turnaround to profitability.
Standalone Net Income turned positive, increasing by ₹50,778 Mn from FY 2022-23 (₹(896) Mn) to FY 2023-24 (₹49,882 Mn), indicating a recovery to positive net income.

history: Established in 1935, it's an Indian multinational pharmaceutical company known for producing affordable medicines.
insights: Consolidated Gross Total Revenue increased by ₹2,981.05 Crores from FY 2023 (₹22,753.12 Crores) to FY 2024 (₹25,774.09 Crores), showing substantial revenue growth.

Standalone Profit Before Tax and Exceptional Items from Continuing Operations increased by ₹1,755.47 Crores from FY 2023 (₹3,191.50 Crores) to FY 2024 (₹4,946.97 Crores), indicating significant improvement in core profitability.

Consolidated Profit for the Year (after tax and attributable to shareholders) from Continuing Operations increased by ₹1,319.54 Crores from FY 2023 (₹2,801.91 Crores) to FY 2024 (₹4,121.55 Crores), demonstrating strong net income growth.

Standalone Profit for the Year (after tax and attributable to shareholders) from Continuing Operations increased by ₹1,569.13 Crores from FY 2023 (₹2,144.06 Crores) to FY 2024 (₹3,714.19 Crores), reflecting a substantial increase in net income.
Standalone Surplus Carried Forward increased by ₹2,316.59 Crores from FY 2023 (₹17,534.77 Crores) to FY 2024 (₹19,634.22 Crores), indicating a strengthening of retained earnings.

history: Established in 1975, it's a state-owned coal mining company and the world's largest coal producer.
insights: Sales (Gross) increased by ₹6,451.53 Crores from FY 2022-23 (₹187,455.57 Crores) to FY 2023-24 (₹193,907.10 Crores), indicating higher revenue generation.

history: Founded in 1984, it's a multinational Indian pharmaceutical company producing a wide range of pharmaceuticals.

history: Established in 1938, it's an Indian multinational conglomerate involved in engineering, construction, manufacturing, and financial services.
insights: Total Assets increased by ₹2,858.25 Crores from March 31, 2023 (₹172,424.49 Crores) to March 31, 2024 (₹175,282.69 Crores), indicating overall balance sheet expansion.
Current Assets increased by ₹1,291.82 Crores from March 31, 2023 (₹122,199.57 Crores) to March 31, 2024 (₹123,491.34 Crores), showing a rise in short-term assets.
Non-current Investments increased by ₹3,192.10 Crores from March 31, 2023 (₹27,036.97 Crores) to March 31, 2024 (₹30,228.77 Crores), reflecting growth in long-term investments.
Current Investments increased by ₹6,388.95 Crores from March 31, 2023 (₹20,224.29 Crores) to March 31, 2024 (₹16,813.34 Crores), indicating a decrease in short-term investments.
Trade Receivables increased by ₹3,809.03 Crores from March 31, 2023 (₹33,152.58 Crores) to March 31, 2024 (₹36,961.55 Crores), showing a growth in amounts owed by customers.

history: Established in 1945, it's a major Indian multinational automotive manufacturing company.
insights: Consolidated Revenue from Operations increased by ₹16,610.55 Crores from 2023 (₹1,212.685.55 Crores) to 2024 (₹1,382.793.00 Crores), indicating significant revenue growth.
Consolidated Profit before Tax increased by ₹3,917.97 Crores from 2023 (₹14,060.23 Crores) to 2024 (₹17,977.79 Crores), demonstrating improved pre-tax profitability.
Standalone Profit before Tax increased by ₹3,847.45 Crores from 2023 (₹9,560.32 Crores) to 2024 (₹13,482.97 Crores), showing substantial growth in standalone pre-tax profits.
Consolidated Profit for the year attributable to Owners of the Company increased by ₹986.17 Crores from 2023 (₹10,281.50 Crores) to 2024 (₹11,268.64 Crores), reflecting a rise in net income.
Standalone Retained Earnings carried forward increased by ₹8,609.10 Crores from 2023 (₹37,478.03 Crores) to 2024 (₹46,309.13 Crores), indicating growth in retained profits.

history: A subsidiary of Nestle S.A., it's a leading food and beverage company in India.
insights: Total Income increased by ₹75,438.3 million from FY 2022 (₹169,979.6 million) to FY 2024 (₹245,418.5 million), indicating substantial revenue growth.
Profit before tax increased by ₹20,329.2 million from FY 2022 (₹32,559.7 million) to FY 2024 (₹52,888.7 million), demonstrating significant improvement in pre-tax profitability.
Profit after tax increased by ₹15,423.4 million from FY 2022 (₹23,905.2 million) to FY 2024 (₹39,328.4 million), reflecting a significant rise in net income.
Closing Balance in Retained Earnings increased by ₹16,889.3 million from FY 2022 (₹15,144.3 million) to FY 2024 (₹32,336.2 million), indicating a substantial growth in retained profits.
Earnings per share increased by ₹16.0 from FY 2022 (₹24.79) to FY 2024 (₹40.79), demonstrating enhanced shareholder value.

history: Established in 1975, it's India's largest energy conglomerate, primarily involved in electricity generation.
insights: Consolidated Profit Before Tax increased by ₹2,810.86 Crores from FY 2022-23 (₹24,330.59 Crores) to FY 2023-24 (₹27,141.45 Crores), demonstrating improved pre-tax profitability.

Consolidated Earnings per share (basic and diluted) increased by ₹2.82 from FY 2022-23 (₹17.44) to FY 2023-24 (₹21.46), indicating enhanced shareholder value.

history: Founded in 1966, it's India's largest private sector company, with diverse interests including petrochemicals, refining, telecom, and retail.
insights: Total Assets increased by ₹336,400,000 from March 31, 2023 (₹9,224,900,000) to March 31, 2024 (₹9,561,300,000), indicating growth in the company's asset base.

history: A joint venture between State Bank of India and BNP Paribas Cardif, it's a leading life insurance provider in India.
insights: Total Income increased by ₹510.9 Billion from FY 2023 (₹815.86 Billion) to FY 2024 (₹1,326.53 Billion), indicating substantial revenue growth.

Total Expenses increased by ₹480.5 Billion from FY 2023 (₹817.8 Billion) to FY 2024 (₹1,298.6 Billion), reflecting a large increase in overall expenses.

Change in valuation of liability in respect of life policies increased by ₹373.9 Billion from FY 2023 (₹41.04 Billion) to FY 2024 (₹784.31 Billion), indicating a significant increase in liability valuation.
Gross Written Premium increased by ₹141.28 Billion from FY 2023 (₹673.16 Billion) to FY 2024 (₹814.31 Billion), showing a notable growth in premium collection.

history: A leading non-banking financial company focused on commercial vehicle financing and other retail lending.
insights: Profit Before Tax increased by ₹1,488.75 Crores from FY 2022-23 (₹8,184.89 Crores) to FY 2023-24 (₹9,683.64 Crores), indicating improved pre-tax profitability.

Dividend on equity shares increased by ₹1,314.58 Crores from FY 2022-23 (₹561.64 Crores) to FY 2023-24 (₹1,876.22 Crores), showing a substantial increase in dividend payout.

history: India's largest public sector bank, with a long history tracing back to the Bank of Calcutta in 1806.
insights: Deposits increased by ₹48,289,010,000,000 from March 31, 2023 (₹442,377,777,630,000) to March 31, 2024 (₹491,607,676,930,000), indicating substantial growth in customer deposits.

history: Part of the Tata Group, it's one of the world's most geographically diversified steel producers.
insights: Tata Steel Consolidated Revenue from Operations increased by ₹11,399.51 Crores from FY 2022-23 (₹243,352.69 Crores) to FY 2023-24 (₹229,170.78 Crores), indicating a decrease in revenue.
